body: @SlaveOfMySword  , Bro, lay off the dope for awhile. Your brain will thank you for it later.  That said, I agree that vanillafags are retarded and anyone that gets 'offended' is a piece of shit. These are fictional stories and that means even if a character does the most heinous, reprehensible things it will not matter because it  doesn't exist. It's a drawing. Fantasy =/= Reality
SlaveOfMySword is a delusional retard, we get it you're a larping cuck, how hard did you nut that made you lose sense of reality, go outside and get off reddit fucking coombrain
@Kenzgf I don't know who you are but you're fucking pussy for only loving vanilla

Wait, just realised she's not my girlfriend, we just have that "agreement" made in bed, thanks to pubs closing in at 10pm. So I don't think I can ask her to go commando at the nearest Tesco anytime soon or I'll get slapped. :(

FINALLY! REVOLUTIONATIC - someone sensible around here who understands what I'm talking about! These virgin vanillafags like @kenzgf here just needs to get a nice 3D girl, or get blown by some homo to at least quit throwing tantrums about NTR. I mean, they all sound like Trump losing on the election. NTR. and all these delectable events that I can't experience in real life with my girlfriend is what I need, otherwise I will ask her to walk with me to get groceries this pandemic in a miniskirt, without panties, at 6am when there's not many people are shopping for the pandemic stuffs. Virgin vanillafags don't get to experience this kind of "relationship", so we get it you don't have someone to get laid, and get offended by NTR, so just leave NTR and f*ck off, really.
As for @revolutionatic, add me on Twitter, dude. Youz my friend for life!
So you're saying people who hate ntr are all virgins? I can stand mild ntr but this is just too much, and the ugly bastard made it worse.

@kenzgf if you want vanilla go romance in real life. The only reason we I love hypnotism and rape so much is precisely because I wouldn't even consider those things in real life. It's escapism. Your virgin is showing.
I would love it if cyclone stop making this ntr scheiße and make some good vanilla. The artstyle is stunning but these stories are revolting to read
Art is good enough to fap but tha traslation must make this awesome
